titles.title: Library Cross Infinite
ライブラリークロスインフィニット
LibraryCross∞

anime.description: * Based on http://anidb.net/cr24131 [Otomate]`s puzzle role-playing game. A medical student named Shiina and nine male partners are trapped in a certain dimensional realm with many ancient texts and an enormous mysterious clock. Together, they must find a way to escape by uncovering clues before the clock strikes "13." Source: ANN
